text: allāhu eṭṭu iṇakaḷe sr̥ṣṭiccu. cem'mariyāṭu vargattil ninn raṇṭuṁ kēālāṭu vargattil ninn raṇṭuṁ. cēādikkuka: allāhu avayil āṇvargatteyāṇēā niṣid'dhamākkiyat; atēā peṇvargatteyēā? atumalleṅkil irutaraṁ peṇṇāṭukaḷuṭeyuṁ garbhāśayaṅṅaḷiluḷḷa kuṭṭikaḷeyēā? aṟivinṟe aṭisthānattil enikku paṟaññutarika; niṅṅaḷ satyasandhareṅkil
